answers.answer: Hello,we are not drs here and I am not familiar with PKD.  I guess this would be a question for your doctor.I hope that you are able to get your blood pressure under control, as BP that high puts you at very high risk.Let  us know how you go.
Surely not related to type 2 diabetes. Try posting on the Kidney Disease & Disorders forum

question: My blood pressure was 180 over 130.  I have been diagnosed with PKD. My hands have a strange smell. Is this related?
title: Kidney
